Module io.github.cowwoc.requirements12.java
Package io.github.cowwoc.requirements12.java.validator

Interface BigDecimalValidator

All Superinterfaces:
ComparableComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, DecimalNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, NegativeNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, ObjectComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, PositiveNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, ValidatorComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, ZeroNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>
public interface BigDecimalValidator extends ValidatorComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, ObjectComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, NegativeNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, PositiveNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, ZeroNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>, ComparableComponent<BigDecimalValidator,BigDecimal>, DecimalNumberComponent<BigDecimalValidator>
Validates the state of a BigDecimal.

  • Method Details

    • isMultipleOf

      BigDecimalValidator isMultipleOf(BigDecimal factor)
      Ensures that the value is a multiple of factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the number being multiplied
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the value or factor are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not a multiple of factor

    • isMultipleOf

      BigDecimalValidator isMultipleOf(BigDecimal factor, String name)
      Ensures that the value is a multiple of factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the number being multiplied
      name - the name of the factor
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the value or any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • name is empty
      • name contains whitespace
      • name is already in use by the value being validated or the validator context
      • the value is not a multiple of factor

    • isNotMultipleOf

      BigDecimalValidator isNotMultipleOf(BigDecimal factor)
      Ensures that the value is not a multiple of factor.
      Parameters:
      factor - the number being multiplied
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the value or factor are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is a multiple of factor

      name - the name of the factor
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the value or any of the arguments are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if:
      • name is empty
      • name contains whitespace
      • name is already in use by the value being validated or the validator context
      • the value is a multiple of factor
